historic_topic: Finance and Financial Sector Development,Agriculture,Macroeconomics and Economic Growth

display_title.display_title:
Niger - Agricultural Credit
            Project : Niger - Projet de Crédit Agricole

subtopic: Agricultural Knowledge and Information Systems,Banks & Banking Reform,Agricultural Research,Crops and Crop Management Systems,Economic Theory & Research
teratopic: Finance and Financial Sector Development,Agriculture,Macroeconomics and Economic Growth

abstracts.cdata!:
The credit will assist in financing: (1)
            credit extended by Caisse Nationale de Credit Agricole
            (CNCA) to farmers for the purchase of seasonal inputs, of
            draft animals and animal-drawn farm implements, and to rural
            cooperatives for the purchase of scales; (ii) an expansion
            of extension services; and (iii) technical assistance to CNCA.
